TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit X509Certificate2UI extends System.Object
.class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit X509Certificate2UI extends System.Object
public ref class X509Certificate2UI abstract sealed

Docs.summary: 显示的用户界面对话框使您可以选择和查看 X.509 证书。 此类不能被继承。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 使用类的方法 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2UI> 来显示用户界面对话框，这些对话框可显示有关 x.509 证书的详细信息，或者允许用户从 x.509 证书的集合中选择一个或多个证书。
## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何显示用户界面对话框，以选择和查看 x.509 证书。
[!code-cpp[CertSelect#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CertSelect/CPP/certselect.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[CertSelect#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CertSelect/CS/certselect.cs#1)] [!code-vb[CertSelect#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CertSelect/VB/certselect.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public X509Certificate2UI ();
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed
Public Sub New ()
public: X509Certificate2UI();

Docs.summary: 显示一个对话框，其中包含 X.509 证书及其关联证书链的属性。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法显示一个对话框，其中包含有关指定的 x.509 证书的详细信息。 此对话框包含用于安装或复制证书的按钮。

MemberSignature.Value: public static void DisplayCertificate (System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2 certificate);
.method public static hidebysig void DisplayCertificate(class System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2 certificate) cil managed
Public Shared Sub DisplayCertificate (certificate As X509Certificate2)
public: static void DisplayCertificate(System::Security::Cryptography::X509Certificates::X509Certificate2 ^ certificate);
static member DisplayCertificate : System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2 -> unit

Docs.param: 要显示的 X.509 证书。
Docs.summary: 显示一个对话框，其中包含 X.509 证书及其关联证书链的属性。

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2UI.DisplayCertificate%2A>方法显示一个对话框，其中包含有关指定的 x.509 证书的详细信息。 此对话框包含用于安装或复制证书的按钮。
## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何显示用户界面对话框，以选择和查看 x.509 证书。

用于显示对话框的父窗口的句柄。
Docs.summary: 使用父窗口的句柄显示一个对话框，其中包含 X.509 证书及其关联证书链的属性。

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2UI.DisplayCertificate%2A>方法显示一个对话框，其中包含有关指定的 x.509 证书的详细信息。 此方法可用于嵌套显示证书信息的对话框。 此对话框包含用于安装或复制证书的按钮。

Docs.summary: 显示一个从证书集合中选择 X.509 证书的对话框。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果要求用户使用对话框手动选择 x.509 证书，请使用此方法。 如果不需要用户交互，请使用 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.Find%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 方法。

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection SelectFromCollection (System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection certificates, string title, string message, System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509SelectionFlag selectionFlag);

.method public static hidebysig class System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection SelectFromCollection(class System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection certificates, string title, string message, valuetype System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509SelectionFlag selectionFlag) cil managed
Public Shared Function SelectFromCollection (certificates As X509Certificate2Collection, title As String, message As String, selectionFlag As X509SelectionFlag) As X509Certificate2Collection

public: static System::Security::Cryptography::X509Certificates::X509Certificate2Collection ^ SelectFromCollection(System::Security::Cryptography::X509Certificates::X509Certificate2Collection ^ certificates, System::String ^ title, System::String ^ message, System::Security::Cryptography::X509Certificates::X509SelectionFlag selectionFlag);

static member SelectFromCollection : System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection * string * string * System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509SelectionFlag -> System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection

Docs.param: X.509 证书的集合，从中选择相应的证书。
指导用户的描述性消息。 该消息显示在对话框中。
值之一，用于指定允许单项选择还是允许多项选择。
Docs.summary: 显示一个从证书集合中选择 X.509 证书的对话框。
Docs.returns: 一个 对象，包含选定的一个或多个证书。

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2UI.SelectFromCollection%2A>如果要求用户使用对话框手动选择 x.509 证书，请使用方法。 如果不需要用户交互，请使用 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.Find%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 方法。
